mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO comprehensive_evaluation_results( COURSE_ID, STUDENT_ID, RESULT_SCORE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_AT ) VALUES
( #{item.courseId}, #{item.studentId}, #{item.resultScore}, #{item.updateBy}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(RESULT_SCORE) AS avgScore, cer.COURSE_ID AS courseId, si.STUDENT_CLASS_ID AS classId FROM comprehensive_evaluation_results cer LEFT JOIN student_info si ON si.ID = cer.STUDENT_ID WHERE cer.COURSE_ID = #{courseId} GROUP BY si.STUDENT_CLASS_ID, cer.COURSE_ID;
